site_name: Land At The Former Worcester Park
decision_conditions: The applicant has submitted insufficient information to satisfy the requirements of Condition 6 (Construction Management Plan). Therefore, the proposal would fail to demonstrate that the amenities of the surrounding residential occupiers, highway safety and the free flow of traffic would be safeguarded in accordance with Policy DM10 (Design Requirements for New Developments including House Extensions) of the LDF Core Strategy Adopted April 2012.
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)

constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: NEIPOL Name: MC1  Maldens and Coombe

VALUER Type: VALUERSDescription: Non-Ownership Interests

description: Details required for Condition 6 (Construction Management Plan) of planning permission 19/00330/FUL (Erection of five/six storey building for 132 bedroom hotel with meeting room,  bar/restaurant and ground floor external terrace, car park and landscaping, together with the reconfiguration of Park Terrace.)
